message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $9500.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $9000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me there?
